sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
satisfies someone
, nekomu ponuja dovolj tistega, kar želi, tako da je zadovoljen.

seg.quote: More frequent feeding will usually help to satisfy a baby.
He had not even been able to satisfy her simple needs.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
satisfies someone
, drugi osebi da dovolj podatkov ali ji pokaže, kaj je bilo nekaj narejeno, tako da jo prepriča, da je tisto res ali da je bilo primerno narejeno.

seg.quote: He would need to satisfy the authorities that he had paid tax for the previous three years.
I glanced around, satisfied myself that the last diner had left, and turned off the lights.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
satisfies the requirements for something
, je dovolj dober ali ustrezen, da je kos določenim zahtevam.

seg.quote: There is some doubt whether they can satisfy our entrance requirements.
